details.fellowshipSong: When We All Get to Heaven #514

list: There will be a brief follow-up meeting for the youth program following the service.
We are accepting donations for the Christmas Shoeboxes. The goal is to send 150.
The Eliza Broadus state mission offering goal is $2500 and will run till the end of the month. Envelopes are in the back of each pew and prayer guides are in the foyer.
October 12: Evening service at Rawlings-Stinson park.
September 27: Men’s Discipleship Group meeting at Mark Deaton’s at 8:00 AM.
October 10-11: We are hosting the CRMA Retreat 'Unity, Salvation, Sanctification.'
